thread.title: Brooklyn man indicted for manslaughter after deadly school bus crash kills passenger - NewsBreak
thread.title_full: Brooklyn man indicted for manslaughter after deadly school bus crash kills passenger - NewsBreak

author: Breaking Local News Report
title: Brooklyn man indicted for manslaughter after deadly school bus crash kills passenger - NewsBreak
text:
Brooklyn
Brooklyn man indicted for manslaughter after deadly school bus crash kills passenger
By Breaking Local News Report,
37 minutes ago BROOKLYN, N.Y. â€” A Brooklyn man has been arraigned on a manslaughter indictment after allegedly speeding through a stop sign and crashing into a school bus, killing his 26-year-old passenger and injuring the driver before attempting to flee the scene in an Uber. Key Points Brooklyn District Attorney Eric Gonzalez announced that Tyree Epps, 32, was arraigned before Supreme Court Justice Dineen Riviezzo on charges including second-degree manslaughter, criminally negligent homicide, assault, and leaving the scene of an incident. Epps was ordered held without bail and is due back in court on June 20. The crash occurred around 1:15 p.m.
